---
title: "Install packages"
author: Luis Valente
---

## Open and run this script in Rstudio

### Install required packages

```{r install, eval=F}
install.packages('DAISIE',dependencies=T)
install.packages('ape',dependencies=T)
install.packages('DAISIEprep',dependencies=T)
```

Check if packages load correctly

```{r load, eval=F}
library(DAISIE)
library(ape)
library(DAISIEprep)
```
